scenarios.hook: POV: You're the emergency contact for literally everyone

chaos_moments.text: School nurse: 'Your daughter has a fever 🤒'
Dad's facility: 'He fell, nothing serious but...'
Mom: 'TV broken. Very scared. Call me.'
Teen: 'MOM WHERE ARE YOU I NEED YOU RIGHT NOW'

scenarios.inner_monologue: Why am I everyone's person? When did this happen?
scenarios.punchline: Your phone battery dies and you have a full panic attack
scenarios.relief_moment: Everyone turns out fine. You're not.
scenarios.cta: Tag someone who's everyone's emergency contact 📱
scenarios.supportive_ending: Being needed means being loved. You're doing great. 💕

scenarios.hook: POV: Sunday family dinner requires military-level logistics

chaos_moments.text: Cut Dad's food + help with science project
Pills for Mom between making soccer snacks
Referee: Grandpa vs Teenager political debate
Explain TikTok to Grandma mid-homework check
Clean everything while everyone relaxes

scenarios.inner_monologue: I love my family. I love my family. I LOVE my family.
scenarios.punchline: Monday feels like a spa day in comparison
scenarios.relief_moment: Everyone says 'thanks for dinner' at once 🥰
scenarios.cta: Who else is the family dinner MVP? 🍽️
scenarios.supportive_ending: These moments become the memories they treasure most. ✨

scenarios.hook: POV: Working from home in the sandwich generation

chaos_moments.text: Kid barges in during client meeting
School: 'Pick up your sick child'
Type emails while making lunch
Explain to boss why you're 'having technical difficulties'

scenarios.inner_monologue: Professional on top, chaos underneath. Story of my life.
scenarios.punchline: 'Sorry, my cat stepped on the keyboard' (it was your life)
scenarios.relief_moment: Somehow you didn't get fired today 🙏
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're pioneering a new way to balance it all. You're amazing. 🌟

scenarios.hook: POV: Christmas morning with three generations

chaos_moments.text: 5:30am: Kids wake you. Coffee not ready.
Help kids, assist grandparents, track batteries
Turkey + sides while managing gift disputes
Coordinate who naps where and when
Everyone's sugar-crashed and overstimulated

scenarios.inner_monologue: This is magical. This is magical. This is... a lot.
scenarios.punchline: You fall asleep in a chair wearing elf ears at 7pm
scenarios.supportive_ending: You create the magic that brings everyone together. ✨

scenarios.hook: POV: Your Google search history is absolutely unhinged

chaos_moments.text: 'How to explain death to a 7-year-old'
'Best shower grab bars for elderly'
'Why won't my teenager talk to me'
'Memory care vs assisted living costs'
'How to not lose mind sandwich generation'

scenarios.inner_monologue: The FBI agent watching my searches needs therapy.
scenarios.punchline: The algorithm thinks you're having an identity crisis
scenarios.relief_moment: You're not alone - millions search the same things 💙
scenarios.cta: Share your wildest sandwich generation search! 🔍
scenarios.supportive_ending: Seeking answers means you care deeply. That's beautiful. 💕

scenarios.hook: POV: You're a real-time translator between generations

chaos_moments.text: Teen: 'Grandpa's being sus' → 'Acting suspicious, Dad'
Grandpa: 'Safe spaces' → 'Your bedroom, honey'
'How do I make the pictures move?' (TikTok)
'No cap bussin frfr' requires full translation
Everyone stares when you know both languages

scenarios.inner_monologue: I'm basically Google Translate for my family.
scenarios.punchline: Your brain runs on three different operating systems
scenarios.relief_moment: Grandpa and teen bond over shared confusion 😂
scenarios.cta: Who else speaks three generations fluently? 🗣️
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're the bridge that keeps the family connected. 🌉

scenarios.hook: POV: Your car is a mobile pharmacy/daycare/Uber

chaos_moments.text: Backseat: Juice boxes + pill organizers + car seats
Glove box: Permission slips + insurance cards + napkins
Center console: Band-aids + anxiety meds + hand sanitizer
Toggle: Pop music → talk radio → audiobook
Pharmacist knows your voice and order

scenarios.inner_monologue: My car has more medical supplies than some hospitals.
scenarios.punchline: AAA thinks you live at CVS
scenarios.relief_moment: Everything needed is magically in your car 🚗
scenarios.cta: Show us your sandwich generation car setup! 🚙
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're always prepared because you always care. 💝

scenarios.hook: POV: Trying to have ONE uninterrupted adult conversation

chaos_moments.text: Mom starts story → kid needs math help
Dad calls confused about his medication
Other kid has friendship emergency NOW
Mom forgets her story halfway through
Give up and just nod at everyone

scenarios.inner_monologue: Remember when conversations had beginnings, middles, and ends?
scenarios.punchline: Your deepest conversation today was with the grocery cashier
scenarios.relief_moment: Finally connect with partner after kids sleep 🌙
scenarios.supportive_ending: The fragmented conversations still add up to love. 💕

scenarios.hook: POV: Bedtime is a multi-generational Olympic event

chaos_moments.text: Read to kid while checking Dad's blood sugar
Tuck in child + Mom's nighttime pills
Verify teenager actually did homework
Everyone settled! Time for YOU!
Water/bathroom/anxiety relief requests

scenarios.inner_monologue: Bedtime is like herding cats. Very tired, anxious cats.
scenarios.punchline: Collapse into bed fully clothed like a cartoon character
scenarios.cta: How many bedtime rounds do you do? 🛏️
scenarios.supportive_ending: You tuck in the whole world before yourself. You're magic. ✨

chaos_moments.text: Find wheelchair accessible place
Check nearby urgent care facilities
Pack medication for small army
Plan fun for ages 8 to 80
Have contingencies for contingencies

scenarios.inner_monologue: Why is a vacation harder to plan than a space mission?
scenarios.punchline: A weekend at home starts sounding like luxury
scenarios.relief_moment: Everyone has fun despite your anxiety 🏖️
scenarios.cta: Share your family vacation planning nightmare! ✈️
scenarios.supportive_ending: You create adventures that span generations. Amazing! 🌟

scenarios.hook: POV: Googling 'is this normal' for multiple life stages

chaos_moments.text: 'Is forgetting names normal at 75?'
'Is hating everyone normal at 13?'
'Is crying in parking lots normal?'
'Is feeling guilty about everything normal?'
'Is wanting to join circus normal?'

scenarios.inner_monologue: Google knows more about my family than I do.
scenarios.punchline: The answer to the circus question is DEFINITELY yes
scenarios.relief_moment: Millions search the same things - you're normal! 💙
scenarios.cta: What's your weirdest 'is this normal' search? 🤔
scenarios.supportive_ending: Questioning everything means you care about everything. 💕

scenarios.hook: POV: You realize you're becoming your mother

chaos_moments.text: Carrying snacks for everyone
Know everyone's medical history by heart
Say 'because I said so' unironically
Worry about everyone constantly
Make her exact facial expressions

scenarios.inner_monologue: When did I become the mom of moms?
scenarios.punchline: And honestly? She was pretty amazing at this job
scenarios.relief_moment: Feel proud to carry on her legacy 💕
scenarios.cta: What trait did you inherit from mom? 👩‍👧
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're continuing a legacy of love. She'd be so proud. ✨

scenarios.hook: POV: You're the Thanksgiving coordinator for 20+ people

chaos_moments.text: Gluten-free, diabetic, vegan, and picky toddler
Navigate family politics with place cards
Turkey math while managing three ovens
Prevent political discussions over mashed potatoes
Somehow you're cleaning alone again

scenarios.inner_monologue: I'm running a small restaurant and family therapy session.
scenarios.punchline: Next year you're ordering pizza and calling it 'deconstructed turkey'
scenarios.cta: Who else is the family Thanksgiving MVP? 🍂
scenarios.supportive_ending: You create the traditions that bind families together. ✨

scenarios.hook: POV: The school pickup line is your second office

chaos_moments.text: Arrive exactly 14 minutes early for good spot
Text other parents while handling calls
Distribute snacks to hungry children
Pre-review assignments in car
Mediate sibling disputes immediately

scenarios.inner_monologue: My car is basically a mobile family therapy unit.
scenarios.punchline: You know every other parent's car and coffee order
scenarios.relief_moment: Perfect sync with your pickup line mom friend 👯‍♀️
scenarios.cta: Pickup line parents are the real MVPs! 🚗
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're part of an amazing community of caring parents. 💕

scenarios.hook: POV: Tax season with multiple dependents and care costs

chaos_moments.text: Medical receipts for everyone everywhere
Who counts as dependent when?
Daycare + elder care + medical = bankruptcy?
Need PhD in tax law for these deductions
Dig through year of car receipts

scenarios.inner_monologue: I'm supporting the entire tax software industry single-handedly.
scenarios.punchline: Your accountant sends sympathy cards instead of bills
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're managing complex finances like a pro. Amazing! 🌟

scenarios.hook: POV: Grocery shopping for three generations

chaos_moments.text: Three different shopping lists + coupons
Low sodium + high fiber + kid-approved
Pick up prescriptions between frozen foods
Calculate costs while preventing meltdowns
Pay while kids ask for everything

scenarios.inner_monologue: I need a personal shopper and a financial advisor.
scenarios.punchline: Spend $300 and somehow have no food for dinner
scenarios.cta: Share your grocery shopping survival tips! 🛒
scenarios.supportive_ending: You keep everyone fed and healthy. You're amazing! 💕

scenarios.hook: POV: Saturday is your unpaid taxi/chauffeur service day

chaos_moments.text: Soccer + piano + physical therapy + groceries
Calculate drive times with traffic variables
Pack snacks for all stops and ages
Playlist that works for everyone (impossible)
Realize you've driven 200 miles in your city

scenarios.inner_monologue: I should charge by the mile like real taxi drivers.
scenarios.punchline: Your car qualifies for commercial vehicle insurance
scenarios.relief_moment: Everyone gets where they need to be safely 🚗
scenarios.cta: How many miles do you drive on Saturdays? 📍
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're the wheels that keep your family moving forward. 🌟

scenarios.hook: POV: Summer camp coordination requires military planning

chaos_moments.text: Camp A ends at 3, Camp B starts at 2:30
Label everything with everyone's names
Coordinate with 15 other parents
Swimming + art + sports = three different bags
Rain day alternatives for outdoor camps

scenarios.inner_monologue: I'm running a summer camp logistics empire.
scenarios.punchline: September can't come fast enough (wait, yes it can)
scenarios.relief_moment: Kids are happy, tired, and sun-kissed ☀️
scenarios.supportive_ending: You're creating magical summer memories. Beautiful! ✨
